duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate ultrasound equipment to make quality images of designated portions of the body under the direct order of a physician.
Accomplish patient care in a professional, efficient, and safe manner.
Perform invasive and non-invasive procedures on a variety of patients, utilizing sterile techniques.
Assist physicians as necessary throughout the Mission Health System.
Produce superior quality imaging studies without constant supervision.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an accredited ultrasound program.
